83 std::string RobotController::getJointLength(std::string letter, Vector3d& torso_lift) {
84  Vector3d waist_joint1;
85  myRobot->getJointPosition(waist_joint1, "WAIST_JOINT1");
86  waist_joint1 /= 100;
87  Vector3d larm_joint1;
88  myRobot->getJointPosition(larm_joint1, (letter + "ARM_JOINT1").c_str());
89  larm_joint1 /= 100;
90  Vector3d larm_joint4;
91  myRobot->getJointPosition(larm_joint4, (letter + "ARM_JOINT4").c_str());
92  larm_joint4 /= 100;
93  Vector3d larm_joint5;
94  myRobot->getJointPosition(larm_joint5, (letter + "ARM_JOINT5").c_str());
95  larm_joint5 /= 100;
96  torso_lift = Vector3d(0,0,larm_joint1.y());
97  Vector3d l_shoulder(0, larm_joint1.x()-waist_joint1.x(), 0);
98  Vector3d l_elbow(larm_joint1.y()-larm_joint4.y(), 0, 0);
99  Vector3d l_wrist(larm_joint4.y()-larm_joint5.y(), 0, 0);
100 
101  std::string arg = " " + toString(l_shoulder.x()) + " " + toString(l_shoulder.y()) + " " + toString(l_shoulder.z()) + " " + toString(l_elbow.x()) + " " + toString(l_elbow.y()) + " " + toString(l_elbow.z()) + " " + toString(l_wrist.x()) + " " +toString(l_wrist.y()) + " " + toString(l_wrist.z());
102  return arg;
103 }

143 void RobotController::calculateTransform(ros::Time time) {
144  tf::TransformBroadcaster br;
145  Vector3d positionNow;
146  Rotation rotationNow;
147  myRobot->getPosition(positionNow);
148  myRobot->getRotation(rotationNow);
149  const dReal* quat = rotation.q();
150  const dReal* quatNow = rotationNow.q();
151  //std::cout << "pos : " << position.x() << " " << position.y() << " " << position.z() << " : " << positionNow.x() << " " << positionNow.y() << " " << positionNow.z() << std::endl;
152  //std::cout << "rot : " << quatNow[1] - quat[1] << " " << quatNow[2] - quat[2] << " " << quatNow[3] - quat[3] << " " << quatNow[0] - quat[0] << std::endl;
153 
154  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped transforms;
155 
156  transforms.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();//m_simulatorTime;
157  transforms.header.frame_id = "odom";
158  transforms.child_frame_id = "base_link";
159  transforms.transform.translation.x = positionNow.x() - position.x();
160  transforms.transform.translation.y = positionNow.y() - position.y();
161  transforms.transform.translation.z = positionNow.z() - position.z();
162 
163  //const dReal* quat = rotation.q();
164  //const dReal* quatNow = rotationNow.q();
165  transforms.transform.rotation.x = quatNow[1] - quat[1];
166  transforms.transform.rotation.y = quatNow[2] - quat[2];
167  transforms.transform.rotation.z = quatNow[3] - quat[3];
168  transforms.transform.rotation.w = quatNow[0] - quat[0];
169  br.sendTransform(transforms);
170 
171 
172  /*transforms.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();//m_simulatorTime;
173  transforms.header.frame_id = "base_footprint";
174  transforms.child_frame_id = "base_link";
175  transforms.transform.translation.x = 0;
176  transforms.transform.translation.y = 0;
177  transforms.transform.translation.z = 1;
178 
179  transforms.transform.rotation.x = 0;
180  transforms.transform.rotation.y = 0;
181  transforms.transform.rotation.z = 0;
182  transforms.transform.rotation.w = 0;
183 
184 
185 
186  br.sendTransform(transforms);//tf::StampedTransform(transform, ros::Time(m_simulatorTime), "odom", "base_link"));*/
187 
188  position = positionNow;
189  rotation = rotationNow;
190 }

192 void RobotController::scan(ros::Time time) {
193  // Calculate vertical angle view (radian) of a camera.
194  double fovy = myRobot->getCamFOV() * PI / 180.0;
195  // Get aspect ratio
196  double ar = myRobot->getCamAS();
197  // Calculate horizontal angle view (degree) of a camera.
198  double fovx = 2 * atan(tan(fovy*0.5)*ar) * 180.0 / PI;
199  unsigned char distance = 255;
200  if(m_view != NULL) {
201  // Get distance vector along a horizontal plane
202  ViewImage *img = m_view->distanceSensor1D();
203  char *buf = img->getBuffer();
204  // Get length of the data array
205  int length = img->getBufferLength();
206 
207  float angle_increment = fovx/320 * (PI/180);
208  float range_min = 0;
209  float range_max = 255;
210  sensor_msgs::LaserScan scan;
211  scan.header.stamp = ros::Time(1.0);//m_simulatorTime;
212  scan.header.frame_id = "base_laser_link";//"base_laser_link";
213  scan.scan_time = 0.0;
214  scan.angle_min = -(fovx/2 * PI/180);
215  scan.angle_max = fovx/2 * PI/180;
216  scan.angle_increment = fovx/320 * (PI/180);
217  scan.time_increment = 0.0; //(1 / laser_frequency) / (num_readings);
218  scan.range_min = 0.0;
219  scan.range_max = 255.0;
220 
221  scan.ranges.resize(length);
222  scan.intensities.resize(length);
223  for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
224  unsigned char c = buf[length - 1 - i];
225  double d = c;
226  scan.ranges[i] = d;
227  scan.intensities[i] = 1.0;
228  }
229  scan_pub.publish(scan);
230 
231  //LOG_MSG(("theta = %.1f, distance = %d",theta, distance));
232  delete img;
233  }
234 }
235 
236 void RobotController::fillPositionArms(std::string arm) {
237  std::string letter = getLetter(arm.c_str());
238  Vector3d posShoulderInit;
239  myRobot->getJointPosition(posShoulderInit, (letter + "ARM_JOINT1").c_str());
240  Vector3d posWristInit;
241  myRobot->getJointPosition(posWristInit, (letter + "ARM_JOINT5").c_str());
242  Vector3d posElbowInit;
243  myRobot->getJointPosition(posElbowInit, (letter + "ARM_JOINT4").c_str());
244 
245  Vector3d elbow90 = pointAfterRotation(posElbowInit, posShoulderInit, -PI/2 + 0.06964);
246  Vector3d wrist90 = pointAfterRotation(posWristInit, posShoulderInit, -PI/2 + 0.06964);
247 
248  /* Create a kinematic state - this represents the configuration for the robot represented by kinematic_model */
249  robot_state::RobotStatePtr kinematic_state(new robot_state::RobotState(kinematic_model));
250  char a = std::tolower(letter.c_str()[0]);
251  std::string b = "_wrist_roll_link";
252  /* Find the default pose for the end effector */
253  kinematic_state->setToDefaultValues();
254  const Eigen::Affine3d end_effector_default_pose = kinematic_state->getGlobalLinkTransform(a + b);
255  Eigen::Affine3d end_effector_pose = Eigen::Translation3d(0.0, 0.0, 0.0) * end_effector_default_pose;
256  ROS_INFO_STREAM("End effector position:\n" << end_effector_pose.translation());
257 
258  // use IK to get joint angles satisfyuing the calculated position
259  bool found_ik = kinematic_state->setFromIK(joint_model_group.find(arm)->second, end_effector_pose, 10, 0.1);
260  if (found_ik)
261  {
262  moveit_msgs::DisplayRobotState msg;
263  robot_state::robotStateToRobotStateMsg(*kinematic_state, msg.state);
264  std::cout << "angles : " << msg.state.joint_state.position[16] << " " << msg.state.joint_state.position[18] << std::endl;
265  Vector3d posWrist = pointAfterRotation(wrist90, elbow90, msg.state.joint_state.position[18] - 0.2103);
266  positionArms.insert(std::pair<std::string, Vector3d>(arm, posWrist));
267  std::cout << "position originale " << posWrist.x()<< " " << posWrist.y() << " " << posWrist.z() << std::endl;
268  }
269 }
270 
271 float RobotController::norm(Vector3d v1, Vector3d v2) {
272  return sqrt(pow(v1.x()-v2.x(), 2) + pow(v1.y()-v2.y(),2) + pow(v1.z() - v2.z(),2));
273 }
274 
275 Vector3d RobotController::pointAfterRotation(Vector3d point, Vector3d center, float angle) {
276  matrix* mtn = new matrix();
277  mtn->setTranslation(-center.x(), -center.y(), -center.z());
278  matrix* rot = new matrix();
279  rot->setRotation(angle);
280  matrix* res = rot->mul(mtn);
281  mtn->reverseTranslation();
282  matrix* res1 = mtn->mul(res);
283  return res1->mul(point);
284 }
285 
286 bool RobotController::getJointPosition(sig_ros::getPartsPosition::Request &req, sig_ros::getPartsPosition::Response &res) {
287  Vector3d vec;
288  if (req.name == "") {
289  myRobot->getJointPosition(vec, req.part.c_str());
290  } else {
291  RobotObj *ent = getRobotObj(req.name.c_str());
292  if (ent == NULL) {
293  return false;
294  }
295  ent->getJointPosition(vec, req.part.c_str());
296  }
297  res.posX = vec.x();
298  res.posY = vec.y();
299  res.posZ = vec.z();
300  return true;
301 
302 }

305 void RobotController::setWheelCallback(const sig_ros::SetWheel::ConstPtr& wheel)
306 {
307  m_radius = wheel->wheelRadius; // radius of the wheel
308  m_distance = wheel->wheelDistance;
309  myRobot->setWheel(m_radius, m_distance);
310 }

312 void RobotController::setWheelVelocityCallback(const sig_ros::SetWheelVelocity::ConstPtr& wheel)
313 {
314  myRobot->setWheelVelocity(wheel->leftWheel, wheel->rightWheel);
315 }

319 /*****************************Services************************/
320 bool RobotController::ik(sig_ros::ik::Request &req, sig_ros::ik::Response &res) {
321  /* Create a kinematic state - this represents the configuration for the robot represented by kinematic_model */
322  robot_state::RobotStatePtr kinematic_state(new robot_state::RobotState(kinematic_model));
323 
324  /* Find the default pose for the end effector */
325  kinematic_state->setToDefaultValues();
326 
327  std::string letter = getLetter(req.arm);
328  if (letter == "") return false;
329 
330  char a = std::tolower(letter.c_str()[0]);
331  std::string b = "_wrist_roll_link";
332  const Eigen::Affine3d end_effector_default_pose = kinematic_state->getGlobalLinkTransform(a + b);
333  Vector3d pos(req.x, req.y, req.z);
334  // If the position given is SIGVerse's
335  if (req.position == "relative") {
336  Vector3d posArmNow;
337  myRobot->getJointPosition(posArmNow, (letter + "ARM_JOINT5").c_str());
338  pos += posArmNow;
339  }
340  if (req.position == "absolute" || req.position == "relative") {
341  std::cout << "pos asked " << pos.x() << " " << pos.y() << " " << pos.z() << std::endl;
342  std::cout << "pos origin " << positionArms.find(req.arm)->second.x() << " " << positionArms.find(req.arm)->second.y() << " " << positionArms.find(req.arm)->second.z() << std::endl;
343  pos -= positionArms.find(req.arm)->second;
344  std::cout << "pos diff " << pos.x() << " " << pos.y() << " " << pos.z() << std::endl;
345  pos.z(0.1 * pos.z() / 1);//0.1 -> 1.77
346  pos.y(0.01 * pos.y() / 1); //0.05 -> 5.4564
347  pos.x(0);
348  std::cout << "pos calculé " << pos.x() << " " << pos.y() << " " << pos.z() << std::endl;
349  }
350  std::cout << req.position.c_str() << " " << pos.x() << " " << pos.y() << " " << pos.z() << std::endl;
351  // calculate a position for the end effector
352  Eigen::Affine3d end_effector_pose =
353 
354  Eigen::Translation3d(pos.z(), pos.x(), pos.y()) * end_effector_default_pose;
355  ROS_INFO_STREAM("End effector position:\n" << end_effector_pose.translation());
356 
357  // use IK to get joint angles satisfyuing the calculated position
358  bool found_ik = kinematic_state->setFromIK(joint_model_group.find(req.arm)->second, end_effector_pose, 10, 0.1);
359  if (found_ik)
360  {
361  moveit_msgs::DisplayRobotState msg;
362  robot_state::robotStateToRobotStateMsg(*kinematic_state, msg.state);
363  for (int i=0; i<44; i++) {
364  std::cout << msg.state.joint_state.position[i] << " ";
365  }
366  std::cout << std::endl;
367  myRobot->setJointAngle((letter + "ARM_JOINT1").c_str(), msg.state.joint_state.position[16] - PI/2);
368  myRobot->setJointAngle((letter + "ARM_JOINT4").c_str(), msg.state.joint_state.position[18]);
369  res.done = true;
370  } else {
371  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Could not solve IK for pose\n" << end_effector_pose.translation());
372  res.done = false;
373  }
374 
375  return true;
376 }

378 std::string RobotController::getLetter(std::string arm) {
379  if (arm == "left") {
380  return "L";
381  } else if (arm == "right") {
382  return "R";
383  } else {
384  return "";
385  }
